src:
PSIS Merasa Hanya Kalah Beruntung dari Persib Bandung
07 Nov 2019, 06:06 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSIS Semarang harus mengakui kehebatan Persib Bandung saat bertandang ke Stadion Si Jalak Harupat, Soreang, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam. Laskar Mahesa Jenar dipaksa menyerah dengan skor tipis 2-1.
Dua gol Persib Bandung dicetak oleh Ezechiel N'Douassel dan Febri Hariyadi pada menit 10' dan 37'. Sementara satu-satunya gol balasan PSIS dicetak Bruno Silva pada menit 53'.
Namun kekalahan tersebut tak lantas membuat pelatih PSIS, Bambang Nurdiansyah kecewa. Dia menyebut anak asuhnya bermain baik, dan hanya kalah beruntung dari Maung Bandung.
"Kami menguasai bola, peluang banyak mereka (pemain PSIS) ciptakan, tapi keberuntungan ada di Persib Bandung," kata Banur usai pertandingan.
Salah satu alasan Banur menganggap Persib menang hoki karena gol kedua ke gawang PSIS dicetak melalui titik putih. Itu pun terjadi karena kesalahan yang tidak perlu pemain belakangnya.
Kesalahan yang dimaksud yakni ketika Fredyan Wahyu melakukan dorongan kepada Ezechiel N'Douassel di kotak terlarang. Yang kemudian dieksekusi dengan sempurna oleh Febri Hariyadi.
"Kenapa pemain saya pakai dorong, dibiarin pun bola out, tapi ini lah sepak bola, segala sesuatunya bisa terjadi," jelasnya.

text:
PSIS Feel Only Losers Lucky from Persib Bandung
Nov 7, 2019, 06:06 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSIS Semarang must recognize the greatness of Persib Bandung when they travel to the Si Jalak Harupat Stadium, Soreang, Wednesday (11/06/2019) night. Laskar Mahesa Jenar was forced to surrender with a thin score of 2-1.
Two goals from Persib Bandung were scored by Ezechiel N'Douassel and Febri Hariyadi on the 10th and 37th minutes. While the only goal PSIS scored Bruno Silva in minute 53 '.
But the defeat did not necessarily make PSIS coach Bambang Nurdiansyah disappointed. He said his foster children played well, and were just out of luck with Maung Bandung.
"We have the ball, a lot of opportunities they (PSIS players) create, but luck is in Persib Bandung," Banur said after the match.
One of the reasons Banur considered Persib to win hockey was because the second goal against PSIS was scored through the white point. That also happened because of an error that does not need the back player.
The mistake in question was when Fredyan Wahyu made a push to Ezechiel N'Douassel in the forbidden box. Which was then executed perfectly by Febri Hariyadi.
"Why do I use thrust players, let even the ball out, but this is football, anything can happen," he explained.
